data.text: @EU_commission #vapers are not unforgiving but we won't forget #EUecigBAN. In May we will know how to vote. No #EUecigBAN
@EU_commission Who sows the wind will reap the whirlwind...no #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission could start by being #eu4citizens and stop handing the #ecigs on a silver platter to BigPharma. #EUecigBAN!
@EU_Commission @LindaMcAvanMEP @EU2013LT the truth is a dangerous thing... only for you! stop #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ich sage NEIN zum #EUecigBAN ! Über meine Gesundheit und Freiheit bestimme ich selbst! Ich dampfe #ecigs
@EU_Commission No #EUecigBAN we are already saving our own lives. We don’t need your help to destroy that.
@EU_Commission NRT product packaging should be clearly marked "Only 7% chance of success" #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission how much will you be paid for  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission On est pas dupe on sait que #BIGTOBACCO est derrière tout ça ! Touche pas ma #ecig ! Détruit le cancer du tabac ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Let democracy have its way or it will vote you out at the first opportunity #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Übernehmt ihr die Verantwortung für die Folgen von #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Democracy not corruption take article 18 out of  the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission #ecigs There is no tobacco in e cigs. They should never have been in the TPD #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #NOecigBAN , denn #EUecigBAN hätte fatale Folgen! #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission #ecigs Why ban e cigs and leave tobacco available freely. don't ban e cigs #EUecigban
@EU_Commission how much will you be paid for  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN bedeutet, dass euch unsere Gesundheit sehr egal ist. #ecigs erhalten!
@EU_Commission If one can't quit smoking, don't take the only effective and much less harmful alternative atm! No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Please act now! Save million lifes! No to #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Take article out of the TPD today #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Hatte ich schon erwähnt, dass ich den #EUecigBAN total undemokratisch und verwerflich finde? Ja, bestimmt!
@EU_Commission #ecigs That's better everyone... trending above X factor again #EUecigban
@EU_Commission  #EUecigban we know the past, we are ready for the future don't listen BIG P and BIG T #ecigs out of TPD
@EU_Commission how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs”!
@EU_Commission how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs”!
@EU_Commission #ecigs why are you doing this to vapers?who is next on your list for a ban? #EUecigban

@EU_Commission permitan que sigamos lejos del tabaco, permitan que muchos otros también lo abandonen.
En beneficio de todos: STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs E cigs are 100 times safer than tobacco do not ban them #EUecigban
@EU_Commission @MarisolTouraine game over. Ne pas retirer l’article 18 et toute votre vie vous serrez suspecter de corruption. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you’re making Europe safe for cigarettes. It’s a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
@EU_Commission only refillable #ecigs are real ecigs and put ur hands away from my rights of free speech! No #EUecigBAN give us #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission #ecigs If there was any doubt about the safty of e cigs the Big T & P companies would be shouting it from the roof #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Hear us #vapers now? Tweeters are just few compared to the millions you are about to mess up with. No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Vaping is neither a crime, nor a bad thing. Corruption is. #EUecigBAN #ecigs

@EU_Commission no sean la Inquisición del siglo XXI.  
STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Let democracy and smokers live... do not ban e cigs #EUecigban
@EU_Commission @LindaMcAvanMEP @EU2013LT  tonight is a whisper, tomorrow it will be a scream STOP #EUecigban
@EU_Commission @Europarl_FR "J'ai fumé, je vape, en mai je vote ! RT @manuvape06 " #EUecigBAN #ecigs out of TPD!
@EU_Commission Allow art.18 to pass and you are condemning millions to death @LindaMcAvanMEP listen to the masses no #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission if you shout jump, we do not ask how high, we ask why? And you make no sense with the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs What happened to democracy. Take article 18 out of the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Ihr wollt einen Schwarzmarkt?Den könnt ihr haben.Aber ist ja auch rentabel für die Politik.Das kennt man ja.STOP #EUecigBAN

Konjunkturhilfen für die Pharmafreunde?
#EU - Basar?
Stop #EUecigBAN

STOP #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission #ecigs retten Leben!Ihr ignoriert das und werft euch lieber Big Tobaco an den Hals! Pfui! NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @MarisolTouraine pas de tabac, pas de combustion. Les vaporisateur n’ont rien à faire dans l’article 18. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Take e cigs out of the TPD and do it NOW #EUecigban

@EU_Commission 
ignore us,  we don't care
we are used to it anyways 
but we are not invisible
#EUecigBAN #ecigs out of TPD
@EU_Commission prove that you have common sense, and not only eye for MONEY #ecigs   NO  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs There is no tobacco in e cigs. They should never have been in the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission You can't order me to #smoke tobacco and die. You see that don't you? No #EUecigBAN  #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission @EUCouncil Don't make OUR decisions for us! I gave up smoking thanks to e-cigs after failing for years! NO to the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Meine Gesundheit ist euch egal.Ihr wollt mein Geld für eure großen Tabak- und Pharma-Freunde. NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Mit dem #EUecigBAN lassen sich die großartigen #ecigs nicht einfach auslöschen.  #NOecigBAN
@EU_Commission I see the Commission, Barroso, FR, talk of diplomacy,  and Hollonde stating he will not attend Sochi and this oppertunity.
@EU_Commission Single use cartomisers are unacceptable to 99 percent of vapers #EuecigBAN also no good to environment!Don't ban #ecigsummit
@EU_Commission Vaping is neither a crime, nor a bad thing. Corruption is. #EUecigBAN #ecigsummit
@EU_Commission you’re making Europe safe for cigarettes. It’s a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
@EU_Commission Es geht nicht um die Gesundheit!Es geht einzig ums GELD und den Schutz der Interessen von Tabak-Lobbyisten!STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Vous êtes assis sur une bombe, vous seuls pouvez éteindre la mèche ! #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission #ecigs Its greed and corruption to ban e cigs and give them to Big tobacco and Pharma #EUecigban
@EU_Commission quand allez vous comprendre que nous ne voulons pas des Ecigs des marchands de mort               #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission If you prohibit #ecigs I'll be an outlaw with pleasure! STOP #EUecigBAN!!!
@EU_Commission Single use cartomisers are unacceptable to 99 percent of vapers #EuecigBAN also no good to environment! Don't ban #ecigs
@EU_Commission @Europarl_DE Wir sind laut und stark! Wir wehren uns!Wir kämpfen für die #ecigs bis zum "Letzten Zug" Stop #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Take article 18 out of the TPD NOW #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Wonder why neither Nicorette Inhaler nor Big Tobs Cigalikes are successful? Frankly, they suck. No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission #ecigs We will not go back to tobacco... you will just make a new black market.#EUecigban
@EU_Commission @FDATobacco Why do you twist science AND common sense to protect Big Tobacco and Pharma?  Stop the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission nous ne sommes pas votre cendrier #EUecigBAN STOP
@EU_Commission #ecigs It is immoral to ban e cigs and leave tobacco freely on sale #EUecigban
@EU_Commission I believe the Sochi Games are a good oppertunity to voice concern about human rights, equality and gay rights, climate change
@EU_Commission Ihr baut auf die Dummheit der Menschen?Mit den Dampfern wird das nichts. Hände weg von unseren #ecigs. STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission ne nous enfumez pas ! STOP #EUecigBAN STOP #EUecigBAN STOP
@EU_Commission @MimicaEU Prove to over 7 million #ecig users that you DO listen by not bringing in the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Take article 18 out of the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Never in the field of public health, could so much be lost for so many by so few. #eicgs #EUeigBAN
@EU_Commission Demokratie im Angebot: wer bietet mehr? Stop #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission #ecigs I will not go back to tobacco. You can take my PV from my cold dead hand #EUecigban

@EU_Commission Tobacco kills half its users. NRT doesn't work for millions. Why are you protecting them ? £€$¥ !
#EUecigBAN
